title: FS: 1905 Souvenir Post Card Shop of Cleveland Postcards (Kahl, Rhoades and Turner)
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: FS: 1905 Souvenir Post Card Shop of Cleveland Postcards (Kahl, Rhoades and Turner)
posts.post_content:
CARDS ARE ALL SOLD.

Was thinking about putting together a set, but have since abandoned the idea. The Kahl and the Turner come from the collection of hobby great Buck Barker, who purchased them from Charles Bray.

Kahl $1,150 SOLD
Rhoades $1,150 SOLD
Turner $1,150 SOLD

Group of 3 - $3,350 SOLD

I will take care of the shipping and insurance.

Sold!  I will take the group!   

Pm sent to you!

Many thanks Kevin

[quote name="BeanTown" post=1598949]Sold!  I will take the group!   

Pm sent to you!

Many thanks Kevin[/QUOTE]

1 minute....hard to beat that for a sale....

Sale completed!   Leon, you sound like my fiancé !   Mike, that makes two items I have of yours.   Lets meet up soon and have dinner and drinks to figure out.   If it was up to Lisa, she would just give you the items as she likes you a lot!   It must be because you have a way with "words".  I need to go re watch Finding Forrester.   

I tried buying Jerrys HOF Rose PCs when he listed on this same BST around 2AM.   I replied within 6 minutes of the listing to later find out they were sold to someone else who beat me, and didn't post on the thread.  So, glad to have been here at the right time and I thought the price was right inline with "market pricing" if not slightly better!

Great Stuff coming out of this section!

Nice items!

JC--You're killing me! Glad you got the cards, and give Lisa my best. Hope you two will be in Chicago this summer.

Cheers, Mike
